entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers 2 (3DS, 2012) (5)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers 2 (3DS, 2012) (5)20140111
I played for three hours today and completely finished the game: I
have all 5 Shining Save Stars, which required getting Triple Crown
lives. This was a very good game, but not as good as 3D Land or
New Super Mario Bros. Wii.

Total time: 14:54
  • Video Games
  • New Super Mario Brothers 2
  • 3DS
  • 2012

entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers 2 (3DS, 2012) (4)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers 2 (3DS, 2012) (4)20140110
I played today for about two hours and beat the game so I could
start on the Star World. I had tried to unlock everything along
the way, so I didn't have enough stars for the first Star level,
which was a pain to go get a few that I missed. The final boss was
fun.

Total time: 11:44

  • New Super Mario Brothers 2
  • 3DS
  • 2012

entry.title: Movie: Kick-Ass 2, starring Aaron Johnson (2013)
entry.content:
Movie: Kick-Ass 2, starring Aaron Johnson (2013)20140110
This movie was just as good as, or better than, the first movie. It
had a new way to show the "real life" of super heros. I
particularly like the way that Mindy's life went. I was kind of
surprised at how good they were able to make it.
  • Movies
  • 2013

entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers 2 (3DS, 2012) (3)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers 2 (3DS, 2012) (3)20140108
I played today for about three hours on a plane ride and did all
of the two special worlds (modulo some exits) and then through to
the middle of world 5. This game is still pretty awesome. I think
I liked 3D Land better though, so far.

Total time: 9:26

  • New Super Mario Brothers 2
  • 3DS
  • 2012

entry.title: Movie: Kick-Ass, starring Aaron Johnson (2010)
entry.content:
Movie: Kick-Ass, starring Aaron Johnson (2010)20140108
This was an intense movie. It's so raw. Hit Girl's life is just too
sad to really get too excited about. I really liked all the scenes
about "real life" in the movie.
  • Movies
  • 2010

entry.title: Movie: Kill Bill, Vol. 2, starring Uma Thurman (2004)
entry.content:
Movie: Kill Bill, Vol. 2, starring Uma Thurman (2004)20140108
This is a great movie and quite a bit more touching than the first
one. I cried a little when The Bride was in the grave and when she
saw BB for the first time. I love the training sequence a lot. It
is so intense when she finally gets Elle.
  • Movies
  • 2004

entry.title: Movie: Kill Bill, Vol. 1, starring Uma Thurman (2003)
entry.content:
Movie: Kill Bill, Vol. 1, starring Uma Thurman (2003)20140108
This is such an epic movie. The Bride is tough in so many different
ways, I love it.
  • Movies

entry.title: Movie: Borat, starring Sacha Baron Cohen (2006)
entry.content:
Movie: Borat, starring Sacha Baron Cohen (2006)20140107
This movie is utterly insane. I can't believe that he really did
these things, but I can't tell how he could have faked some of
it. The bear! All the crazy stuff about Jewish people! Insane.
  • Movies
  • 2006

entry.title: Movie: Team America: World Police, directed by Trey Parker (2004)
entry.content:
Movie: Team America: World Police, directed by Trey Parker (2004)20140107
This movie is insane. The use of puppets is just amazing. I loved
the moment when the "panthers" came out and the amazing songs. I
almost can't believe that this movie was made. The additional
credits song was great.
  • Movies
  • 2004

entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers 2 (3DS, 2012)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers 2 (3DS, 2012)20140106
There are so many coins and I love the Golden Flower. I played to
W4-4 in about four hours. Later in the day I played for another
hour while watching something and tried to do an infinite 1-Up
trick, but failed.

Total time: 5:21

entry.content:

This was a really funny movie with a lot of ridiculous moments. The
Boston accents were pretty amazing.

entry.title: Movie: Once Upon a Time in China, starring Jet Li (1991)
entry.content:
Movie: Once Upon a Time in China, starring Jet Li (1991)20140106
I'm not totally sure why, but I didn't like this movie very much. I
thought the story was pretty dumb. It does seem like Yip Man is a
remake of this though, and much more awesome and coherent.
  • Movies
  • 1991

entry.title: Game: Bionic Commando Rearmed (Steam, 2008) (2)
entry.content:
Game: Bionic Commando Rearmed (Steam, 2008) (2)20140105
I played through the rest of the game today and had a pretty good
time. The final level was really epic, although I didn't like that
you had to conserve lives across the entire thing. I almost quit
during the Docks stage too, because I kept missing the jump. I
think that this is probably better than the NES version but needs
a better controller than the 360. Unfortunately, I don't think the
FightPad would have even worked because of the final boss fight.

Total time: 4:03
  • Video Games
  • Bionic Commando Rearmed
  • Steam
  • 2008

entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers Wii (Wii, 2009) (9)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers Wii (Wii, 2009) (9)20140105
We got the last coin on 9-2 and all the coins on 9-3 tonight. It
was duesy. I also discovered a new way to grind on 2-2. This game
is amazing.

Total time: 32:56
  • Video Games
  • New Super Mario Brothers Wii
  • Wii
  • 2009

entry.title: Game: Bionic Commando Rearmed (Steam, 2008)
entry.content:
Game: Bionic Commando Rearmed (Steam, 2008)20140104
I started this today and had a lot of fun with it. I did the
tutorial and had some challenges on some of the timing. I felt
like the controller was really at fault, but when I tried to use
the FightPad, it didn't work. Anyways, after the tutorial I
started the game on Hard mode and did level 1. It was pretty
brutal and then the game crashed.

I restarted and lowered the difficulty and started having a much
better time. I did about five or six levels; it's hard to keep
track because they aren't in order. I'll definitely try to finish
it.

As compared to the NES version... this seems /exactly/ the same
but with just a few modern niceties and funnier dialogue. 

Total time: 1:44
  • Video Games
  • Bionic Commando Rearmed
  • Steam
  • 2008

entry.title: Game: Braid (Steam, 2009) (2)
entry.content:
Game: Braid (Steam, 2009) (2)20140104
I played today for about three hours and beat the game. Some of
the puzzles were really crazy. I loved the one where you use the
painting as a platform. The final sequence was pretty awesome,
despite the ridiculous meaning. My final time for the game is
pretty epic.

The game feels like it can't really be played again since it is so
puzzle-focused.

Total time: 4:20
  • Video Games
  • Braid
  • Steam
  • 2009

entry.title: Game: Braid (Steam, 2009)
entry.content:
Game: Braid (Steam, 2009)20140103
I started playing this and did it for about an hour. I'm not doing
everything because I feel like there must be something more that I
could do that I don't yet have access to. I find all the writing
to be incredibly pretentious and lame. The core gameplay is pretty
fun, but it feels a little bit too trial-and-error-y so far.

Total time: 1:12
  • Video Games
  • Braid
  • Steam
  • 2009

entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers Wii (Wii, 2009) (8)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers Wii (Wii, 2009) (8)20140103
We played today has a whole family 4-player and finished
everything in World 8. Some of the levels were incredibly hard,
especially with 4 people. We spent the most time on 8-7 and 8-1's
last coin. It was pretty insane with lots of yelling and
complaining. :)

Total time: 30:57
  • Video Games
  • New Super Mario Brothers Wii
  • Wii
  • 2009

entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers Wii (Wii, 2009) (7)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers Wii (Wii, 2009) (7)20140102
We played tonight and got all the Star Coins on World 7. World 7-4
took a lot of lives out of us, like 25. We went back to 2-2 and
found a new way to grind lives. Next, we found the secret way to
7-6, which was a really fun level but took a lot of time. I love
that you can get to the boss of World 7 directly from its short
cut. It's very cute. Now, we have to clear World 8 and
then 9. Exciting!

Total time: 28:31
  • Video Games
  • New Super Mario Brothers Wii
  • Wii
  • 2009
